title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite : CY11001 Structure and bonding: covalent, ionic and metallic bonding. Lattice energy and defects in solids. Atomic properties & periodicity: ionic and covalent radii, electronegativity, ionization potential, electron affinity. Acids and bases. HSAB theory. Chemistry of hydrogen, nitrogen and oxygen. Book: Inorganic Chemistry by Shriver and Atkins.
